about_the_game:
FERRUM inc is a multiplayer active third-person shooter.

You will be the operator of FERRUM inc, which is engaged in producing military robots. Control your war machine, participate in 5-by-5 tactical exercises, and work as a team!

The essential mechanics of our project is the unique camera control. You can switch between first and third-person views, as well as switch to the camera-drone control mode and set it at any point on the map getting an additional point of view!

Enemies spotted by the drone will be highlighted through the obstacles and walls. You have to be careful to stay off the radar!
